content: Next, head left through a narrow passage and defeat the Monk Supporter that guards it, before moving left again. Just before you reach the entrance to an underground tunnel, look on the right just past a series of wooden posts to find the third Buddha statue.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Bitter_Lake_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Bitter Lake Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Precept Corridor'.
The content is as follows:
Next, head left through a narrow passage and defeat the Monk Supporter that guards it, before moving left again. Just before you reach the entrance to an underground tunnel, look on the right just past a series of wooden posts to find the third Buddha statue.
